Episodes.Title: Bored of the Rings
Episodes.Plot: Sarah discovers that the community group she joins is a radical anti-abortion group; a game of "Dungeons and Dragons" interferes with Steve and Brian's plans for a date night.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language,sexual material and other content that may offend

Episodes.Title: Joan of Arf
Episodes.Plot: Authorities take Sarah's dog Doug away when she is witnessed licking his hindquarters. Distraught, Sarah goes on a quest to redeem herself.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language,sexual material and other content that may offend

Episodes.Title: Face Wars
Episodes.Plot: Sarah strongly believes that it is much easier to be a black person in America than it is to be a Jewish person. To prove her point she decides to become black for a day. Meanwhile, Brian and Steve get carried away smoking medical marijuana.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language,sexual material and other content that may offend
Episodes.GuestStars: Alex Desert, Beth Tapper, Henriette Mantel, Paul F. Tompkins, Karri Turner, Murray Gershenz, Eddie Pepitone, Chris Tallman, Justin Roiland, Rob Schrab, Susan Yeagley

Episodes.Title: Doody
Episodes.Plot: When their mother's grave is vandalized, Sarah and Laura become contestants on their favorite TV show in hopes of winning enough money to replace the tombstone.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Ah, Men
Episodes.Plot: Sarah starts a relationship with God who turns out to be needy and insecure. However, she still hopes to show him off at her upcoming high school reunion. In the mean time, Brian and Steve question the origins of their sexuality.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Maid to Border
Episodes.Plot: Sarah fires her maid, Dora, believing that she has stolen her beloved Hamburglar doll. When her life slips into filthy disarray, Sarah goes to Mexico to get her maid back, but Dora has since gained unexpected power.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: High, It's Sarah
Episodes.Plot: Sarah gets high for the first time, and leaves herself a voicemail imploring herself to treat her stoned thoughts seriously, and to act on them.  Jay has a problem with nocturnal emission.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Garry Marshall, Tig Notaro, Missi Pyle

Episodes.Title: The Mongolian Beef
Episodes.Plot: Sarah discovers her Russian ancestors were raped by Mongolians.  Steve's homemade short films get him some popularity with a demographic he'd never thought possible.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Making New Friends
Episodes.Plot: Sarah realizes her old friends aren't that much fun, so she decides to look for new ones.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Patriot Tact
Episodes.Plot: Sarah defends our freedom by running over anyone with a beard.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Erick Avari, Fred Armisen, Joe Lo Truglio, Tig Notaro

Episodes.Title: Pee
Episodes.Plot: Sarah has a problem with bedwetting. Well, Actually she's quite good at it.

Episodes.Title: There's No Place Like Homeless
Episodes.Plot: Sarah joins the rank of the homeless after losing her keys, but seems to like her new status after meeting an old friend who shows her the advantages of living on the streets.

Episodes.Title: Fetus Don't Fail Me Now
Episodes.Plot: Sarah cannot believe she is pregnant, and it seems to be too much for her to handle.

Episodes.Title: I Thought My Dad Was Dead, But It Turns Out He's Not
Episodes.Plot: Sarah discovers that her father is not dead.  Brian spends a ridiculous amount of money on a DVD set, then commits to watching it enough times that it will make itself more economical than if he'd rented it. Guest starring Tim Heidecker as Jay's grief counselor.

Episodes.Title: Kangamangus
Episodes.Plot: Brian and Sarah set out to coin the next big word, in hopes it will become part of society's slang terms.
